languages.text: "Это совершенно безумное обвинение. Разумеется, никто из нас не берет на службу преступников намеренно! Да, отслеживать все факты биографии каждого пустотника, появившегося на судне, никто не берется в силу безнадежности такого мероприятия..." {n}Данрок заминается на секунду.{/n} "Однако никто из нас и в мыслях не имел заселять ваш корабль еретиками!"

traits.locale_text: "Большинство осужденных работают под началом кормчего Равора и имеют прямой доступ к бортовому оружию и управлению кораблем".

languages.text: "This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"
languages.original_text: "Это совершенно безумное обвинение. Разумеется, никто из нас не берет на службу преступников намеренно! Да, отслеживать все факты биографии каждого пустотника, появившегося на судне, никто не берется в силу безнадежности такого мероприятия..." {n}Данрок заминается на секунду.{/n} "Однако никто из нас и в мыслях не имел заселять ваш корабль еретиками!"

I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

"This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

languages.text: 「こんなの、まったくもって馬鹿げた言いがかりです！私たちが意図的に犯罪者をクルーにしているですって？そんなわけがないでしょう！確かに、船に乗り込むヴォイズマン一人ひとりの経歴をすべて洗い出しているわけではありません。ですが、それは単に、そんなことは現実的に不可能だからです…」{n}ダンロックは一瞬、言葉を詰まらせた。{/n}「それでも、私たちの誰一人として、この船を異端者で埋め尽くそうなどという意図はありません！」
languages.original_text: "This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

traits.locale_text: 「こんなの、まったくもって馬鹿げた言いがかりです！私たちが意図的に犯罪者をクルーにしているですって？そんなわけがないでしょう！確かに、船に乗り込むヴォイズマン一人ひとりの経歴をすべて洗い出しているわけではありません。ですが、それは単に、そんなことは現実的に不可能だからです…」{n}ダンロックは一瞬、言葉を詰まらせた。{/n}「それでも、私たちの誰一人として、この船を異端者で埋め尽くそうなどという意図はありません！」

languages.text: "Bu suçlama, baştan aşağı deli saçması. Mürettebata bilinçli bir şekilde suçluları alacak değiliz herhâlde! Elbette almıyoruz! Gemimize ayak basan her uçsuz erinin hayat hikâyesini didik didik incelemediğimiz doğrudur ancak bunu yapacak olsaydık hiçbir yere varamazdık..." {n}Danrok bir anlığına duraksıyor.{/n} "Hiçbirimizin bu gemiyi kâfirlerle doldurmak gibi bir niyeti yok!"
languages.original_text: "This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu suçlama baştan aşağı deli saçması. Mürettebata bilinçli bir şekilde suçluları alacak değiliz herhâlde! Elbette almıyoruz! Gemimize ayak basan her uçsuz erinin hayat hikâyesini didik didik incelemediğimiz doğrudur ancak bunu yapacak olsaydık hiçbir yere varamazdık.."{n}Danrok bir anlığına duraksar.{/n} "İçimizden hiçbirinin bu gemiyi kâfirlerle doldurmak gibi bir niyeti yok!"

languages.text: «Es una acusación demencial. ¡No traemos criminales a la tripulación de forma intencionada! ¡Es evidente que no! Admito que no estudiamos la biografía entera de cada infante del vacío que sube a bordo, pero solo porque sería absurdo...». {n}Danrok titubea por un momento.{/n} «¡Pero ninguno de los aquí presentes llenaría su nave de herejes a propósito!».
languages.original_text: "This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

traits.locale_text: «Es una acusación demencial. ¡No traemos criminales a la tripulación de forma intencionada! ¡Es evidente que no! Admito que no estudiamos la biografía entera de cada infante del vacío que sube a bordo, pero solo porque sería absurdo...». {n}Danrok titubea por un momento.{/n} «¡Pero ninguno de los aquí presentes llenaría su nave de herejes a propósito!».

languages.text: “这样的指控简直是一派胡言！我们根本没有蓄意将罪犯带到这艘船上！这种事情我们怎么可能干！我承认，我们确实没打算把这艘船上每个船员的底细都查个干净，因为这简直是白费时间……”{n}丹罗克迟疑了片刻。{/n}“不过，没有任何人打算把异端分子带到您的船上，大人！”
languages.original_text: "This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

traits.locale_text: “这样的指控简直是一派胡言！我们根本没有蓄意将罪犯带到这艘船上！这种事情我们怎么可能干！我承认，我们确实没打算把这艘船上每个船员的底细都查个干净，因为这简直是白费时间……”{n}丹罗克迟疑了片刻。{/n}“不过，没有任何人打算把异端分子带到您的船上，大人！”

languages.text: « Cette accusation est ridicule. Nous ne recrutons pas intentionnellement des criminels ! Bien sûr que non ! J'admets que nous ne nous penchons pas sur les moindres détails biographiques de chaque cosmomarin qui monte à bord, mais seulement parce que ce serait une entreprise interminable... {n}Danrok marque une hésitation.{/n} Aucun d'entre nous n'avait pour objectif de peupler votre vaisseau d'hérétiques ! »
languages.original_text: "This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette accusation est ridicule. Nous ne recrutons pas intentionnellement des criminels ! Bien sûr que non ! J'admets que nous ne nous penchons pas sur les moindres détails biographiques de chaque cosmomarin qui monte à bord, mais seulement parce que ce serait une entreprise interminable... {n}Danrok marque une hésitation.{/n} Aucun d'entre nous n'avait pour objectif de peupler votre vaisseau d'hérétiques ! »

languages.text: "Das ist eine absolut wahnwitzige Anschuldigung. Wir holen doch nicht absichtlich Kriminelle in die Crew. Auf gar keinen Fall! Ich gebe zu, dass wir nicht die gesamte Vergangenheit jedes einzelnen Raumfahrers durchleuchten, der an Bord kommt, allerdings nur, weil das ein hoffnungsloses Unterfangen wäre ..." {n}Danrok stockt kurz.{/n} "Aber keiner von uns hatte die Absicht, Euer Schiff mit Ketzern zu bevölkern!"
languages.original_text: "This is a completely insane accusation. We are not bringing criminals into the crew intentionally! Of course we're not! I'll admit that we do not try to hunt down every biographical fact about each voidsman who sets foot on board, but only because that would be a hopeless endeavour..." {n}Danrok falters for a moment.{/n} "But none of us had any intention of populating your ship with heretics!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine absolut wahnwitzige Anschuldigung. Wir holen doch nicht absichtlich Kriminelle in die Crew. Auf gar keinen Fall! Ich gebe zu, dass wir nicht die gesamte Vergangenheit jedes einzelnen Raumfahrers durchleuchten, der an Bord kommt, allerdings nur, weil das ein hoffnungsloses Unterfangen wäre ..." {n}Danrok stockt kurz.{/n} "Aber keiner von uns hatte die Absicht, Euer Schiff mit Ketzern zu bevölkern!"
